title: Disney Fairies: Welcome to Pixie Hollow
description: From Tinker Bell to Fira, this beautifully illustrated guide to Pixie Hollow gives detailed descriptions of everyone's favorite fairies, both the well-known and the obscure. Full of fun facts about more than 100 fairies and other residents of Never Land, this beautiful book is sure to delight any Fairies fan. Plus, the book features a reversible jacket that can be used as a poster
author: Calliope Glass
